plot: Maps show how Roman towns grew into the Holy Roman Empire, before forming the German nation. From the Bavarian Alps to the Baltic Sea ports, and the former communist east to western areas, see the geography and culture of unified Germany.
title: Germany
plot_es: Maps show how Roman towns grew into the Holy Roman Empire, before forming the German nation. From the Bavarian Alps to the Baltic Sea ports, and the former communist east to western areas, see the geography and culture of unified Germany.
